Description:
Executive Pad or a Brilliant Start
Situated just moments to the bustle of Ormond village with shopping, cafs, eateries, station and amenities, this executive ground-floor apartment flaunts designer living at its best delivering an enviable lifestyle pad ideal for homebuyers entering into the property market, downsizers and professionals alike. A bright and inviting free-flowing layout boasts an expansive living and dining area enjoying sliding doors opening out to the undercover paved patio and tidy courtyard with entry direct to Grange Road with bus transport. The sophisticated kitchen sparkles with stainless-steel appliances (oven, gas cooktop, range hood and dishwasher) and is beautifully appointed with a waterfall island bench with breakfast bar flaunting solid Caesar stone surfaces plus a large pantry and wine rack. The inviting bedroom is fitted with mirrored robes and serviced by the ultra-chic bathroom with discreet European laundry. A powder room, split-system heating and cooling, a private underground car space, storage cage and security entrance finishing ideally. Positioned close to trams, parklands and walking trails, Carnegie Swim Centre, Caulfield Racecourse, and just a ten-minute drive to Brighton Beach, this fabulous inner-suburb apartment is sure to be coveted. Act fast and enquire today!
- Elegant and stylish one-bedroom apartment
- Open plan living and meals with access to patio and courtyard
- Sparkling kitchen showcasing stone surfaces and stainless appliances
- Mirrored robes, powder room, ultra-chic bathroom and European laundry
- Split-system, secure car space and storage cage, close to amenities
Property Code: 496

Description:
Rent Out, Style Up...Or Just Relax!
Looking to start in a leafy locale? Hoping to invest in a lifestyle location? Ready to value-add at an in-demand address? Look no further, this is the One! Just 100m to the bus to Monash University and a three block walk along the shopping strip to the station, this ground-floor apartment offers the perfect blend of ready-rentability and value-adding potential!
Sized up with generous single-bedroom floorplan, this wonderful one bedroom home has a sun-filled north-facing lounge, separate kitchen with room to dine and a large ensuite-bathroom beyond a robe-fitted bedroom.
With carport parking at the door, you can move in or rent out and be rewarded by this leafy location and blue-chip address. Alternatively, roll up your sleeves, paint, polish and upgrade to reap the rewards of a value-adding renovation in this high-amenity location! Whether the plan is to rent out, style up or just relax, this is One with so many possibilities!

Description:
Affordable, Sun-filled, Beautifully renovated apartment
3km from Monash University, located in the heart of Ormond this northern facing impeccably renovated one bedroom apartment is guaranteed to impress. The open living room plan comes with a fully renovated kitchen featuring a gorgeous stone bench top, brand new stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, built in microwave and induction hob. The bedroom is generously proportioned with new built-in wardrobes & a beautifully renovated bathroom with the highest quality finishes. Moments away from the Ormond Shopping strip, buses, trains, two stops away from Monash University Caulfield Campus, schools, reserves plus a short drive down to the famous Chadstone Shopping Centre & Westfield Southland. Smothered in opportunity this affordable apartment is ideal for investors, first home buyers, downsizers and young professionals. it is one that absolutely cannot be missed! Rental appraisal $350 per week
Auction: 20th September at 11:30am
To arrange an inspection please make an enquiry.

Description:
Retro Classic in the Zone High on McKinnon Hill
Located in Ormond's best street on top of McKinnon Hill, this sun drenched retro 1950's home offers a family friendly plan with 3 bedrooms, two living areas and is as neat as they come. Featuring meticulously preserved vintage detail throughout, including etched glass doors, decorative plasterwork, curved mantle fireplace, and timber floors, it also boasts multiple living areas for any growing family. Bright airy kitchen with meals area is located in the heart of the home, with the spacious 2nd living zone overlooking established rear gardens with garage. It boasts ducted gas heating, evap cooling, is in the coveted McKinnon College zone, metres to Ormond Primary School and an easy walk to Ormond station and McKinnon Road cafe strip.

Description:
Plus-size apartment with serenity & security
Bring space, serenity, security and relaxed living into your life and do it with Ormond village shops, trains, cafes and buses within walking distance and a host of other amenities nearby! Large than average, this first-floor apartment is positioned at the rear of a modern block with intercom entry and an automatic gate to the carport. The apartment has a sunny north-facing open-plan lounge/dining room (reverse-cycle A/C) with chic kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, and tiled splashback. A private balcony opens off the lounge room. The plus-sized bedroom (BIRs) is ensuite with a dual-accessed bathroom that includes laundry facilities.
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724

Description:
4 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, In-Zone Entertainer!
With a family fresco focus, this timeless 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom period beauty is rich in character with an entertainer's floor plan. Blending modern contemporary fittings with classic architectural styling sees ducted heating, cooling & plantation shutters complimenting high ceilings, rich polished boards & feature leadlight. Separate formal lounge & dining rooms are zoned away from the vast kitchen/family room which showcases a dramatic black splashback, 900ml stainless-steel stove & dual drawer dishwasher-whilst four spacious bedrooms include a master with full ensuite & a 2nd family bathroom with relaxing deep bath beneath bi-fold timber windows. Designed to maximise the indoor-outdoor connection, large glass sliders open to a laserlight & shade-sail covered BBQ deck with built-in swim spa...perfect for the whole family. Wrapped by pretty gardens beyond its picket fence, this charming property is walking distance to shops, parks, zone 1 station & in-zone McKinnon Primary & Secondary College on 696m2/7,490sqft (approx)...

Description:
Rise to the top in Urban Chic
Hidden away at the back of the block on a floor all its own, this dynamic 2 bedroom 1st floor security apartment speaks volumes with its space, finishes and first class position.
Soaked in northern sun, this impressive retreat features expansive open plan living & dining with a beautiful alfresco terrace, sparkling stone kitchen with porcelain tiled floors & glass splashback (stainless steel appliances), 2 double bedrooms (BIRs, main with private balcony), stylish porcelain bathroom with large shower and European laundry.
With plenty of storage and versatility within the open plan layout, this terrific first home or investment boasts R/C air conditioning, intercom access and basement security parking with storage cage.
Excitingly close to Ormond station, shops, cafes and restaurants, moments to parkland, bike trails and the Monash University bus.

Description:
Captivating Period Charm With Private Access To Joyce Park
The captivating Californian Bungalow silhouette of this graceful family residence is but a hint of the resplendent spaces and magnificent garden oasis (725m2/7804sqft approx) which lay peacefully behind. Past the verandah, the period allure subtly combines with modern features with scope for future enhancement if desired. High decorative ceilings and picture rails complement the rich timber floors that adorn traditional lounge (OFP) and dining rooms and pristine kitchen overlooking an open family/meals area (gas firepalce). Double doors extend living to a fabulous covered entertaining deck stepping into a glorious rear garden creating a peaceful oasis with private access to Joyce Park. Enjoy 3 bedrooms (main with walk-in robe and ensuite), study/4th bedroom, original bathroom, water tanks, shed and single carport plus a brilliant location in the McKinnon Secondary College zone, moments to local shops, transport and schools.

Description:
Brilliantly located & stylish townhouse
It's not just the terrific location of this stylish low-maintenance townhouse that will win you over it's also its position towards the rear of a tranquil boutique development, as well as its light bright neutral decor and its deluxe inclusions. Impeccably presented to showcase the space-maximising floorplan, this home has the living room flowing into the open dining area and sparkling kitchen (gas cooktop) and then outside to a private, partially covered courtyard. Upstairs there are 3 double bedrooms - the master with ensuite - plus the family bathroom. Making life easier are a range of extras -
security alarm, reverse-cycle air conditioning, ducted vacuum, European laundry, powder room, and direct house entry from the garage (there's an off-street car space as well). Stroll to Ormond shops, trains and buses; and enjoy convenient access to recreation, parks, Kilvington and major access roads.
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724

Description:
Ulupna Close' Quiet and Full of Sun Light
With loads of appeal and promise, this delightful 1 bedroom ground floor apartment is bathed in lovely sunshine and welcoming space. Warm and inviting with parquetry floors, this sweet retreat features a spacious living & dining room with leafy aspects, vintage kitchen/meals, north facing bedroom with walk through robe and a stylishly renovated ensuite with walk in shower. Perfect to live in or lease out with room to improve over time, this comfortable gem has a security door, Rinnai gas space heater, internal laundry taps (and communal laundry) and a carport. Almost 50sqm internally, in this well maintained block, a casual stroll to Ormond shops and station with easy access to 2 Monash Uni campuses, delightful parks and fabulous cafes.

Description:
Villa Living Should Always Be This Good!
Here's a villa that's you'll want to call your own. It's peacefully set at the rear of two homes on the block and offers all the comforts and considerations we expect today, plus quite a bit more. It has been renovated with confidence to include a neutral decor with bold highlights to add edginess to the interior design. Leading the way is the open plan living room where the kitchen elicits a big tick of approval. Glossy tomato red glass splashback and cabinetry (soft close drawers and doors) is offset by appliances faced in black glass, and by the white composite stone benchtops. Two of the 3 bedrooms have attractive translucent glass on the BIRs, and both chic bathrooms are fully tiled. A private wraparound courtyard has a north-facing covered deck. Security alarm, ducted heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, and direct entry to the house from the double garage are among the inclusions. Catch the bus from directly outside; the route goes from Elsternwick to Chadstone Shopping Centre and points in between. Reserves and recreation are nearby, major access roads are handy; Monash Uni (Caulfield campus) is not far and all other amenities are in convenient distance.
Photo ID Required
Frankie Jayne

Description:
Relaxing lifestyle in a convenient locale
Stylishly presented, and updated with bright white paintwork and new charcoal-coloured carpet, this ground-floor apartment, at the front of the block, is sure to delight owner-occupiers and investors alike. Adding to its allure is its location just around the corner from the Ormond shopping strip, near buses and trains, close to parks, reserves and recreation; and handy to schools and other amenities. There's intercom entry to this unit, which also delivers 2-bedroom (built-in wardrobes) accommodation, and an entrance hall opening to a living room that accesses a balcony. The kitchen includes dining space; and the bathroom incorporates the laundry.
An undercover car space makes life even easier here.

Description:
Prized Living in McKinnon School Zone
A fantastic opportunity presents to secure a highly prized Ormond address, directly opposite Joyce Park & within easy walking distance (plus zoned) to McKinnon Secondary College. Positioned on a sizeable corner allotment of approx. 485sqm, this 4 Bed/2 Bath Californian Bungalow offers fabulous potential for a modern renovation to enhance its classic period appeal, or opportunity to develop your own piece of desirable family living (STCA). Offering 4x light-filled bedrooms (main/WIR/ensuite), all framing an incredibly spacious open-plan living & dining zone. A large kitchen features dishwasher drawers, electric cooking, breakfast bar dining & wonderful potential to redesign, plus an additional living room (west-facing) has French doors opening out to undercover verandah, paved alfresco courtyard & large, deep gardens just ready to be enhanced. Also featuring a DBL carport, secure gate, ducted heating, evap. cooling, service courtyard & all just moments to shops, cafes + Zone 1 trains.

Description:
Rosewood" c. 1927 Grand Brick Californian on Large Land
One of the grandest period homes on this grand in-Zone period streetscape, Rosewood c.1927 is a late Californian Bungalow of spectacular scale and superb Art Deco influences. Extended from a solid-brick base with a four bedroom, two bathroom floorplan the home cleverly uses a wide triple-fronted design across a sweeping 60'/18.29m frontage to offer gracious living in bow-bay-windowed lounge and dining rooms - while an elegant master suite (with ensuite and WIR), a rear kids' wing and an expansive family zone offer the best of modern family life.
With spectacular fireplaces, lavish leadlight and elaborately decorated ceilings pointing to the home's history as a residence of significance, the home is also significantly well-renovated for today's living with an elite appliance and granite kitchen overlooking the family zone, quality bathrooms, ducted heating and cooling.
Even the grounds offer a superior blend of beauty and amenity with a through-access oversized double garage (with workshop and through access to boat or trailer parking) set in around 8520sqft/791sqm rose-filled hedged formal surrounds. Situated close to Ormond's shopping and transport strip just minutes' walk to McKinnon College, this is a grand Californian on great land.

Description:
764m2 (approx) of In-Zone Perfection...with Park Views!
Located in one of McKinnon Secondary College zone's most sought-after streets, this pretty period property offers a land of possibility on 764m2/8,232sqft (approx). High ceilings & rich polished boards form the perfect backdrop to modern contemporary amenity, with ducted heating, evaporative cooling & security alarm. Infused with a cool Scandinavian vibe through formal & informal living, this immaculate home offers three robed bedrooms, a luxe dual-vanity bathroom plus 2nd bathroom featuring Euro laundry, cosy formal lounge (open fireplace), a spacious family room with dining area & a sparkling kitchen fitted with quality stainless-steel appliances! Step outside to discover child & pet friendly gardens, a versatile fully self-contained bungalow, utility shed & parking for the whole family, including a double lock up garage plus double carport. With a park literally across the road, a safe walk to in-zone McKinnon Primary & Secondary College, plus shops & Ormond or McKinnon stations - this is a simply irresistible buy.

Description:
Glenburn' Exquisite Beauty in a Parkland Locale
Absolutely beautiful, this distinct 4 bedroom 3 bathroom Californian Bungalow is presented with the utmost care in quality and finishes. It provides a unique blend of its original 100 year old (approx. ) charm with subtle touches of modern luxury.
Impeccable with its original oak stained floorboards, high strapped ceilings, leadlight windows and gorgeous wrought iron chandeliers, this engaging treasure features a wide entry hall, double doors to 2 superb bedrooms (custom fitted BIRs, main with ensuite), gorgeous bathroom, open plan entertaining with French doors onto a sun filled deck with Bamboo screening and water feature; luxury granite kitchen (Bosch & Blanco appliances, mini walk in pantry) and a fitted laundry leading to the double auto garage.
Upstairs, there is a charming rumpus room, children's bathroom and 2 attic style bedrooms (BIRs). Flawlessly finished, this glorious home is complete with granite benchtops, video airphone intercom, alarm, ducted heating, air conditioning, smart wiring, data networking, underground power, ducted vac and a superbly landscaped secure front garden.
Just metres to Oakleigh Road parkland, a short stroll to North Road shops and restaurants, train, bus and leading schools.

Description:
Warmth, charm & space for the family
The charm & warmth of the Californian Bungalow era remains in this modernised home, which glows with the care lavished on it. Wide entrance hall opens to formal lounge room & into large family room & modern kitchen. There are 4 double bedrooms (BIRs) - 2 with ensuites - plus a family bathroom, & a retreat/home office/5th bedroom (BICs). Blackbutt floors, ducted heating, A/Cs & loads of off street parking add to the appeal & amenity, while the oasis-like garden surroundings makes outdoor entertaining a joy. The property (land approx 633sqm) is near buses, trains, shops, cafes, schools & parks.
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790

***UNDER OFFER***
What a superb offering for the first homebuyer, astute investor or those thinking of downsizing. This immaculate first floor renovated apartment offers a spacious and easily managed lifestyle environment walking distance to Ormond shops, buses and train station. Comprising open plan living and dining with polished floorboards complimented by a modern kitchen with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and a hideaway space specifically designed for your washing machine, 2 generous robed bedrooms and central bathroom. With privacy preserved by a security gate, allocated undercover carspace and split system heating/cooling adding extra elements to an outstanding opportunity.

Description:
Stylish and Spacious in Leafy Beauty
Hidden behind a high fence and a towering Jacaranda tree, this casual 2 bedroom street front residence is made to meet your lifestyle needs.
With the ease of polished boards and 2 stylish alfresco courtyards, this sun filled retreat features a north facing living room with adjoining dining area, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 2 double bedrooms (BIRs), updated retro bathroom, separate toilet and fitted laundry.
Easy to live in or let out, this homely haven features a security porch, double blinds, low voltage lighting, ducted heating, an air conditioner and a lock up garage with 2nd car space on drive. In the McKinnon Secondary College zone, a short walk to North Road shops, cafes, train, Ormond Primary School and Monash University bus.
